#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

shared_ptr<ShardMasterClient> ShardKvServer::CreateSMClient()
{
  auto smcli = make_shared<ShardMasterClient>();
  smcli->commo_ = sp_log_svr_->commo_;
  Log_info("Partition %d Site %d: Shardmaster client created",GetRaftServer().partition_id_,GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
  return smcli;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  Log_info("Message from client reached site with site id %d",GetRaftServer().site_id_);
  uint64_t myLocId = GetRaftServer().site_id_;                   
  Log_info("Site %d: Put started with %s:%s",myLocId,k.c_str(),v.c_str());


  shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable> s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> sMar = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

  uint64_t raftLeaderIndex,raftLeaderTerm;

  bool isLeader = GetRaftServer().Start(sMar,&raftLeaderIndex,&raftLeaderTerm);

  if(!isLeader)
  {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  if(outstanding_requests_.find(to_string(oid)) == outstanding_requests_.end())
  {
    outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = nullptr;
  }

  if(outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] == nullptr)
  {
    outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  }

  outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)]->Wait(2000000);

  if(outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)]->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT)
  {
    //Should we store this anyway for "record"?
    outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = nullptr;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = nullptr;
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  uint64_t myLocId = GetRaftServer().site_id_;                   
  Log_info("Site %d:Append started with %s:%s",myLocId,k.c_str(),v.c_str());


  shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable> s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> sMar = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

  uint64_t raftLeaderIndex,raftLeaderTerm;

  bool isLeader = GetRaftServer().Start(sMar,&raftLeaderIndex,&raftLeaderTerm);

  if(!isLeader)
  {
    Log_info("Site %d:Returning not leader with %s:%s",myLocId,k.c_str(),v.c_str());
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  if(outstanding_requests_.find(to_string(oid)) == outstanding_requests_.end())
  {
    outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = nullptr;
  }

  if(outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] == nullptr)
  {
    outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  }

  outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)]->Wait(2000000);

  if(outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)]->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT)
  {
    Log_info("Site %d:Timeout with %s:%s",myLocId,k.c_str(),v.c_str());
    outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = nullptr;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  
  outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = nullptr;
  Log_info("Site %d: Appended into DB values %s:%s",myLocId,k.c_str(),v.c_str());

  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  uint64_t myLocId = GetRaftServer().site_id_;    
  Log_info("Site %d: Get started with key %s",myLocId,k.c_str());


  shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable> s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);  
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> sMar = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

  uint64_t raftLeaderIndex,raftLeaderTerm;

  bool isLeader = GetRaftServer().Start(sMar,&raftLeaderIndex,&raftLeaderTerm);

  if(!isLeader)
  {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  if(outstanding_requests_.find(to_string(oid)) == outstanding_requests_.end())
  {
    outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = nullptr;
  }

  if(outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] == nullptr)
  {
    outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  }

  outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)]->Wait(2000000);

  if(outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)]->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT)
  {
    outstanding_requests_[to_string(oid)] = nullptr;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  if(kv_store_.find(k) == kv_store_.end())
  {
    v = nullptr;
  }
  else
  {
    *v = kv_store_[k];
  }

  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
      auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
      string opid = v->data_[0];
      string optype = v->data_[1];
      string opkey = v->data_[2];
    //this means event did not timeout
    if(optype == "put")
    {
        string opval = v->data_[3];
        kv_store_[opkey] = opval;
        Log_info("Put into DB values %s:%s",opkey.c_str(),opval.c_str());
    }
    if(optype == "append")
    {
        string opval = v->data_[3];
        if(kv_store_.find(opkey) == kv_store_.end())
        {
          kv_store_[opkey] = opval;
        }
        else
        {
          kv_store_[opkey] = kv_store_[opkey] + opval;
        }
        Log_info("Appended into DB values %s:%s",opkey.c_str(),opval.c_str());
    }
    if(optype == "get") // handle synchronously in "get" function
    {
        Log_info("Get op replicated for key %s",opkey.c_str());
    }
    if(outstanding_requests_.find(opid) != outstanding_requests_.end() && outstanding_requests_[opid] != nullptr)
    {
      outstanding_requests_[opid]->Set(1);
    }
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
